scenes.action_text: AMERICAN FICTION Written for the screen by Cord Jefferson Based upon the novel 'Erasure' by Percival Everett OVER BLACK MONK OK. Let's begin. INT. USC CLASSROOM - DAY We open on THELONIOUS "MONK" ELLISON (black, 50s, neurotic, tired) standing before a classroom of college students, most of them white. MONK Who wants to start? BRITTANY (white, 19) raises her hand.
